summary: COOLING SYSTEM CONTINUES TO LEAK AFTER BEING REPLACED FOR THE THIRD TIME NOW. THE CAR DOES NOT RETAIN COOLANT OR WATER TO KEEP THE ENGINE FROM OVERHEATING. THE CAR WILL OVERHEAT IF IT DOESN'T HAVE COOLANT OR WATER. I HAVE TO FILL THE RESERVOIR EACH TIME BEFORE DRIVING AND WHEN DRIVING I AM LIMITED TO ABOUT 8 HOURS WITHOUT THE AIR CONDITION ON.
